articles.title: Sony's new PS5 with a removable disc drive launches in November - The Verge
articles.description: Sony is launching a new PS5 design that has a removable disc drive. The new design will be available in the US beginning in November. The old design will be phased out.
articles.content:

articles.title: Wild plants may edit their genomes in the same way we make GM crops – and it could be crucial to evolution - The Conversation Indonesia
articles.description: Recent study investigated how fast genes are being transferred between distantly related species.
